org.alicebot.ab

Class Graphmaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.alicebot.ab.Graphmaster

  • public class Graphmaster
extends java.lang.Object
    The AIML Pattern matching algorithm and data structure.

        Parameters:

        path - Pattern path to be added

        that - that pattern

        Returns:
        leaf node or null if no matching node is found

               java.lang.String topic)

        Parameters:
        input - client input
        that - bot's last sentence
        topic - current topic
        Returns:
        matching leaf node or null if no match is found

      • match

        final Nodemapper match(Path path,
               java.lang.String inputThatTopic)
        Find the matching leaf node given a path of the form "input <THAT> that <TOPIC> topic"
        Parameters:
        path -
        inputThatTopic -
        Returns:
        matching leaf node or null if no match is found

      • match

        final Nodemapper match(Path path,
               Nodemapper node,
               java.lang.String inputThatTopic,
               java.lang.String starState,
               int starIndex,
               java.lang.String[] inputStars,
               java.lang.String[] thatStars,
               java.lang.String[] topicStars,
               java.lang.String matchTrace)
        Depth-first search of the graph for a matching leaf node. At each node, the order of search is 1. $WORD (high priority exact word match) 2. # wildcard (zero or more word match) 3. _ wildcard (one or more words match) 4. WORD (exact word match) 5. <set></set> (AIML Set match) 6. shortcut (graph shortcut when that pattern = * and topic pattern = *) 7. ^ wildcard (zero or more words match) 8. * wildcard (one or more words match)
        Parameters:
        path - remaining path to be matched
        node - current search node
        inputThatTopic - original input, that and topic string
        starState - tells whether wildcards are in input pattern, that pattern or topic pattern
        starIndex - index of wildcard
        inputStars - array of input pattern wildcard matches
        thatStars - array of that pattern wildcard matches
        topicStars - array of topic pattern wildcard matches
        matchTrace - trace of match path for debugging purposes
        Returns:
        matching leaf node or null if no match is found

      • fail

        void fail(java.lang.String mode,
        java.lang.String trace)
        print out match trace when search fails
        Parameters:
        mode - Which mode of search
        trace - Match trace info

      • nullMatch

        final Nodemapper nullMatch(Path path,
                   Nodemapper node,
                   java.lang.String matchTrace)
        a match is found if the end of the path is reached and the node is a leaf node
        Parameters:
        path - remaining path
        node - current search node
        matchTrace - trace of match for debugging purposes
        Returns:
        matching leaf node or null if no match found
